message: Let's be fair, Bob. I am proposing I take $85 and you get $15. Consider the inflation - it's better to take a sure deal now.
Alice, your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. I'm proposing a more reasonable split this time.  Let's be fair and avoid this thing dragging on.
Bob, let's be realistic.  My offer accounts for the fact that the value decreases for me each round. This is my final offer.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. We both lose out if we don't reach an agreement. A 50/50 split is the only fair option at this point.
